name: Fungicide (Kepler Softworks)
description:
Kill mushrooms in this exciting, fast paced, horde-mode FPS!

  • Shoot Two (2) Enemies!
  • Reload your Two (2) Guns!
  • Explore Two (3) Levels!

R to reload, Shift to Sprint, Mouse wheel to change weapons, normal FPS controls, esc to quit game

New in v 0.002:

  • Logo is no longer a really bad DOOM ripoff!
  • New Harbor Map (Unfinished)!
  • New music!
  • Lights no longer come from nowhere!
  • New Enemy Type!
  • Level Select Screen!
  • Gameover allows you to return to the main menu instead of closing game!
  • Enemies no longer go to where you used to be!
  • Shoot enemies with the railgun!
  • Secrets (a secret)

New in v 0.001: 

  • We have Mick Gordon at home!
  • Gameover screen actually shows your score now!
  • Title screen isn't completely black anymore!
